ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennifer Blood is a suburban wife and mom by day, and a ruthless vigilante by night! Every day she makes breakfast, takes the kids to school, cleans the house, naps for an hour or two, makes dinner, puts the kids to bed, and kisses her husband goodnight. This suburban punisher is ready to be unleashed in a story that can only be told by the legendary Garth Ennis in this amazing 40 page first issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Main Cover | Tim Bradstreet | 1 | Var | Variant Cover A (1:15) | Alé Garza | 2 | Var | Variant Cover B (1:20) | Jonathan Lau | 6 | Var | Variant Cover C (1:20) | Johnny Desjardins | 8 | Var | "Blood Red" Dynamic Forces Exclusive Cover (1,974 copies only; see solicit below) | Tim Bradstreet | 7 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Tim Bradstreet Virgin Variant | Tim Bradstreet | Missing | RI | Retailer Incentive - Alé Garza Red Variant | Alé Garza | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Jonathan Lau Negative Variant | Jonathan Lau | 4 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Johnny Desjardins Black & White Variant | Johnny Desjardins | 3 | *Solicit for the "Blood Red" Variant Cover:* Limited to only 1,974 copies - the year Garth's signature character - The Punisher - first appeared! (Yes, we feel she's as bad ass as the Punisher!)
